amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit the use of funds be used in violation of section 8 of the National Labor Relations Act of 1935, with respect to workers on federally-funded transportation projects.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds be used in violation of section 8 of the National Labor Relations Act of 1935, with respect to workers on federally-funded transportation projects.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A045) Agreed to by voice vote.
